content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: ACTARMCD
      operator: empty
    - name: ACTARM
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000120
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when ACTARM is not empty, but ACTARMCD is empty
Outcome:
  Message: ACTARM is populated, when ACTARMCD is NULL
  Output Variables:
    - ACTARMCD
    - ACTARM
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0522
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: "\"If ACTARMCD is null, then ACTARM must be null and\
                  \ ARMNRS must  be populated with the reason ACTARMCD is null.\n\
                  \ Both ARMCD and ACTARMCD will be null for subjects who were not\
                  \ assigned to treatment. \n The same reason  will provide the reason\
                  \ that both are null.\""
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Assumption 4
                Section: '5.2'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM

json.Description: Raise an error when ACTARM is not empty, but ACTARMCD is empty

Outcome.Message: ACTARM is populated, when ACTARMCD is NULL

Citations.Cited_Guidance:
"If ACTARMCD is null, then ACTARM must be null and ARMNRS must  be populated with the reason ACTARMCD is null.
 Both ARMCD and ACTARMCD will be null for subjects who were not assigned to treatment. 
 The same reason  will provide the reason that both are null."
